title: Overnight Ferry - Kyushu â†’ Osaka
content:
Our "hotel" for the night was on a "ferry" travelling between the east side of Kyushu and Osaka. There were 3 decks for passengers, with a variety of rooms with shared bathrooms or ensuites. Some vending machines and a small convenience store had simple food options, and there was a restaurant where we had breakfast.

This was a really cool experience! It was dinner time when we boarded, so we had a nice simple meal from the vending machines and convenience store. After, I went into the public areas of the ship and caught up with some of our tour group for a pretty good chat - we shared stories and thoughts about the trip so far and just had a good time.

Slept well enough as the ship was nice and smooth, and got some early morning photos outside before breakfast. Coming into a city from the water was a neat change.

We all really enjoyed this part of the trip - it was a unique and comfortable way to move between the places!
